about_the_game:
Summary


" I'm off to a seminar. will be back soon. "

A week had passed since his girlfriend left home after saying that.
All that was left was a photo of the mansion
and the "Meeting to Think about NecroNegate - What is True Relief for Bereaved Families?'

What was waiting for me at the old mansion I arrived at
It was a shocking sight and a cruelty truth...

Follow in the footsteps of your lover


Traces of human habitation remain inside the mansion.
Why did she come to this place...?
And what happened in this mansion...
Let's continue our search and unravel the mysteries left behind.

Open the closed door.


A dark, spacious mansion, hidden passages, and tightly closed doors.
In order to move forward, you must carefully explore the mansion
and look for items and tricks that will help you solve mysteries.

Countering the oncoming threat


The soul is extinguished from the body, and the empty life form 'NecroNegater'
Is salvation for them death or life?
While managing the weapons, attachments, and bullets you have acquired.
Fight against the threats that attack you.

name: Necro Negate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX1660
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Ryzen7 5800X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX2060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: A mysterious mansion where he arrives in pursuit of his missing lover In order to fight against the threats that are coming your way, you must collect the necessary items and and solve various tricks to open the closed door. What is the shocking truth that awaits you after overcoming various fears
